/* Explorers */ the name is TOWN CENTER, not Town Hall
Updated infobox to state that a workaround is available to make the game work on Win2K and to link to Microsoft, WinXP, Win2K articles
/* External links */ Removed MSXML 4.0 link because the article no longer references MSXML 4.0

/* System requirements */ It says in one sentence that installation on Windows 2000 is impossible, then says two sentences later that it is possible using workarounds. Impossible means no workarounds!
MB is normally ALWAYS written in CAPS
remove Windows 2000 section - wikipedia doesn't publish howto guides. Try gamefaqs or wikibooks.
/* Demo */ AoE III will install on Windows 2000, but *using the normal procedure*, it will only install on Windows XP; worded MSXML 4 sentence to be more encyclopedic
MSXML 4.0 d/l link belongs in "external links"; split up "external links" into "official", "fansites", "other"
MSXML link should be local to demo section
